item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Hacker in Snowflake extortions may be a U.S. soldier (97 points | 30 comments)
2. I Didn't Need Kubernetes, and You Probably Don't Either (34 points | 6 comments)
3. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (263 points | 163 comments)
4. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (182 points | 34 comments)
5. Executing ARM Jazelle (JVM Bytecode) on the Wii's Starlet (35 points | 2 comments)
6. GenChess (153 points | 115 comments)
7. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (287 points | 112 comments)
8. ZetaOffice: LibreOffice in the Browser (93 points | 19 comments)
9. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (8 points | discuss)
10. Marshall Brain died hours after alleging retaliation at NC State (147 points | 52 comments)
11. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (172 points | 51 comments)
12. LLVM-powered devirtualization (180 points | 6 comments)
13. Git-crypt – transparent file encryption in Git (49 points | 21 comments)
14. We can mine asteroids for space food (128 points | 141 comments)
15. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (109 points | 56 comments)
16. Creating a social photo frame from scratch (11 points | 2 comments)
17. Show HN: I created a lightweight JavaScript library to visualize JSON as a graph (15 points | 13 comments)
18. FQL: A KV Query Language (22 points | 3 comments)
19. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (82 points | 22 comments)
20. Show HN: Clean Your Mac with a Script (27 points | 8 comments)
21. The impact of the cosmological constant on past and future star formation (3 points | discuss)
22. Setelinleikkaus: When Finns snipped their cash in half to curb inflation (199 points | 181 comments)
23. Imperfect Parfit (4 points | 1 comment)
24. ISPs say their "excellent customer service" is why users don't switch providers (115 points | 82 comments)
25. Ask HN: Has anyone tried adapting a court reporter keyboard for writing code? (46 points | 51 comments)
26. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (48 points | 29 comments)
27. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (42 points | 24 comments)
28. The industry structure of LLM makers (109 points | 107 comments)
29. The AI reporter that took my old job just got fired (256 points | 301 comments)
30. Remembering Cyberia, the first ever cyber cafe (106 points | 62 comments)
